title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
While pasta cooks, heat a large skillet and cook pancetta until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk eggs and grated cheeses together with black pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving a cup of pasta water.
Add hot pasta to the skillet with pancetta, remove from heat.
Quickly stir in the egg and cheese mixture, adding pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and 1 tbsp tikka masala paste for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked through and slightly charred.
In a separate pan, melt butter and saut√© onions until golden.
Add garlic and ginger, cook for 1 minute.
Add remaining tikka paste and canned tomatoes, simmer for 10 minutes.
Add cream and cooked chicken, simmer for 5 more minutes.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice or naan.
